script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Our next contestant is a Google Data Engineer from London, but originally from Italy! Please welcome Andrea! He'll be performing an acoustic rendition of 'Somebody to Love' by Queen, but with a data-driven twist for us. Andrea, let's see what you've got!

script.speaker: Participant
script.text: START PERFORMANCE - Andrea performs an acoustic rendition of 'Somebody to Love' by Queen, changing some lyrics to 'find some data to flow'.

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Alright, Andrea! You weren't wrong, Queen is definitely a favorite. You got some pipes on ya, man. And 'find some data to flow'? Genius!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Ha! I love it! That's dedication to the day job right there. You know, Freddie would've appreciated that data flow lyric. Respect, Andrea.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: There's something so pure about someone pouring their heart out like that. You could feel your passion for data, Andrea. It was unexpectedly powerful.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: I mean, who knew data could be so soulful? You really made it your own, Andrea.  That was a really fun performance.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Data or no data, that was a performance to remember. Judges, your thoughts?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Andrea, that was awesome! You get a YES from me!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Totally agree. It's a YES from me, too!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: That was truly unique, Andrea. It's a YES from me.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Data never sounded so good! It's a YES from me!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses! Andrea, you've successfully merged music and data, and you're going to the next round!
